DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to determine whether ingestion of modified pasta products (Dreamfields, Miracle Noodles) result in an improvement in blood glucose concentration when compared with a traditional pasta.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Pasta on Blood Glucose Response in Normal Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: On one occasion the pasta will be a traditionally available pasta; on another occasion, approximately 1 week later a modified pasta, advertised to contain ~ 5 grams of digestible carbohydrate, or to be low in digestible starch, will be studied.
DOC.keyword: Low Biologically Available Glucose Diet (LoBAG diet)
